sentences.english: The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 亞摩斯的兒子以賽亞得默示，論到猶大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The word of the Lord to Israel by Malachi .
sentences.chinese: 耶和華藉瑪拉基傳給以色列的默示。

sentences.english: The burden of Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
sentences.chinese: 論尼尼微的默示，就是伊勒歌斯人那鴻所得的默示。

sentences.english: The burden of Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
sentences.chinese: 論尼尼微的默示，就是伊勒歌斯人那鴻所得的默示。

sentences.english: In those days the word of the LORD was rare; there were not many visions.
sentences.chinese: 當那些日子，耶和華的言語稀少，不常有默示。

sentences.english: There are no implied licenses granted under this Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 在本協議中炬力並未向您授予任何默示許可。

sentences.english: The word which Isaiah, the son of Amoz, saw about Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 亞摩斯的兒子以賽亞得默示，論到猶大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Displaying your problem-solving skills is better than babbling about something you don't understand.
sentences.chinese: 默示出解決問題的能力要比胡侃強。

sentences.english: The burden of the word of the LORD to Israel by Malachi.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華藉瑪拉基傳給以色列的默示。
她用嘴脣的動作默示“安靜”。

sentences.english: This is what Isaiah son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem
sentences.chinese: 亞摩斯的兒子以賽亞得默示，論到猶大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: An oracle: The word of the LORD to Israel through Malachi.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華藉瑪拉基傳給以色列的默示。

sentences.english: Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD: The word of the LORD had not yet been revealed to him.
sentences.chinese: 那時撒母耳還未認識耶和華，也未得耶和華的默示。

sentences.english: The burden which Habakkuk the prophet did see.
sentences.chinese: 先知哈巴谷所得的默示。

sentences.english: The Holy Spirit inspired David to prophetically write these words.
sentences.chinese: 聖靈默示大衛以先知的身份寫下這些話。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Book of Job (in the Old Testament)
